techmeme.title: At the request of South Korean regulator, Apple blocked 14 and Google blocked 17 crypto apps, including exchanges KuCoin and MEXC, from their app stores (Camomile Shumba/CoinDesk)
India plans to add 200M-300M UPI users, including via delegated accounts for kids, and pitch UPI abroad; PwC: India makes up ~46% of global digital transactions (Bloomberg)
Sources: TSMC is close to finalizing specs for a new chip packaging method, known in the industry as "panel-level", to meet rising demand for powerful AI chips (Cheng Ting-Fang/Nikkei Asia)
Science Corp., which was started by Neuralink co-founder Max Hodak to develop a retina and brain implant system, raised over $100M led by Khosla Ventures (Ike Swetlitz/Bloomberg)
AMD announces its first 2nm silicon fabricated on TSMC's N2 process, set to debut on its 6th-gen EPYC "Venice" chip, which is expected to launch in 2026 (Anton Shilov/Tom's Hardware)
